## Motivations
- What user/problem this change addresses.
- Why this needs to ship now.

## Modifications
- Summarize concrete code changes grouped by area.
- Focus on what changed in this diff (not surrounding context).
- Call out any behavior changes, defaults, or removed fields.

## Results
- User-visible outcomes after this change.
- Validation performed (tests/lint/typecheck/manual checks).
- Residual risks or follow-ups, if any.
